item.title: Gohugo Setup
item.description: Install GoHugo on Linux The quickstart guide on Hugo is pretty comprehensive. Please check it out! Install latest hugo version: sudo snap install hugo Create a hugo site: hugo new site [sitename] By default, no theme is installed, so you need to install one on your own! cd [sitename];\ git init;\ git submodule add https://github.com/budparr/gohugo-theme-ananke.git themes/ananke;\ # Edit your config.toml configuration file and add the Ananke theme. echo 'theme = "ananke"' >> config.
